summary: This adds an Athletism skill, that will improve over use (sprinting for now), and let the cgharacter move faster overall, and sprint longer as he improves in the skill
descriptionHtml:
As you can read from reports, this mod, although simple in its execution, is not bug free. Don\'t forget to make a clean save of your game before using it.

What it does:
This skill randomly checks when you are sprinting (the longer the sprint, the more chance the check happens, although this is quite random).
Then, 4 possibilities: 
Critical failure : you gain +++ Athletics XPs, but you get a big Stamina drop.
Failure: ++ Athletics Xps, stamina drop.
Success: + Athletics XPS, light stamina gain.
Critical success: very few Athletics Xps gain, good stamina gain (means you can run longer)

The skill comes in 6 levels: 
Ignorant (base speed = 90%), from start
Novice (base speed = 100%)
Apprentice (base speed = 105%)
Adept (base speed = 110%)
Expert (base speed = 115%)
Master (base speed = 130%)

+, the more levels you are, the better you will do. So a master Athlete could really run fast and sprint a long time, because he will succeed or critical succeed at most of his sprinting checks.

I hope you enjoy, feedback for tweaks appreciated.
